      private static java.util.ArrayList<Message> Home.getConv(User user, User friend)

      Creates and sends a message to the target user
      void User.unfriend(User friend)
      Checks if friend is contained in list of users friendships, and if so, removes them from it.

      Helper method that checks if friend target is a valid one.
